WorkflowInfo.Name: Rename a file on FTP server
WorkflowInfo.Description: Add date and time to the file name
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process opens an FTP connection and adds the current date and time to the file name. You can use this process to keep old versions on your server.
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:StartFTPSession;Assembly=StartFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:FTPRenameFile;Assembly=FTPRenameFile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:TerminateFTPSession;Assembly=TerminateFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:StartFTPSession Password="" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Start FTP Session" IsValid="True" HostId="1" Port="21" TypeName="StartFTPSession" Description="Starts FTP Session." TimeInSeconds="0" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" x:Name="startFTPSession1" Timeout="00:01:00" Passive="0" UserName="" SecureConnection="0" StartSession="FTP" /><ns1:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Minutes" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm" TimeZoneName="(UTC+02:00) Jerusalem" TimeZone="120" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." DisplayName="Get Date" TypeName="GetDate" TimeToAdd="0" /><ns2:FTPRenameFile TargetPath="/log_%getDate1%.txt" SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="ftpRenameFile1" HostName="{x:Null}" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" DisplayName="FTP Rename File" SourcePath="/log.txt" Description="FTP rename a file." HostId="0" TypeName="FTPRenameFile" /><ns3:TerminateFTPSession SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="terminateFTPSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate FTP Session" Description="Terminate FTP session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateFTPSession" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
